name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit>=1.28.0; echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /workspaces/AI-Based-Road-Inspection-System/src/Deployment/.streamlit && if [ -n "${FMS_EMAIL}" ] && [ -n "${FMS_EMAIL_PASSWORD}" ]; then echo "[email]" > /workspaces/AI-Based-Road-Inspection-System/src/Deployment/.streamlit/secrets.toml && echo "sender_email = \"${FMS_EMAIL}\"" >> /workspaces/AI-Based-Road-Inspection-System/src/Deployment/.streamlit/secrets.toml && echo "sender_password = \"${FMS_EMAIL_PASSWORD}\"" >> /workspaces/AI-Based-Road-Inspection-System/src/Deployment/.streamlit/secrets.toml; else echo '⚠️ FMS_EMAIL or FMS_EMAIL_PASSWORD not set. secrets.toml not created.'; fi
